title: Is Dr Rowena Hall still alive?  She was a dr at the Babies Hospital at Wrightsville Beach.  I was named after her.  My mom is 86 years old and mentioned dr hall this afternoon.  Mom told me that my father really like dr hall and that\'s why i was named after her.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7071
